name: SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION
name_abbreviation: School District v. Commonwealth, Department of Education

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Order affirmed, 63 Pa.Cmwlth. 39, 437 A.2d 530.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Persifor S. Oliver, Jr., Asst. Sol., Robert J. Stefanko, Sol., Bd. of Public Educ., School Dist. of Pgh. Legal Dept., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Elisabeth S. Shuster, Mollie A. McCurdy, Deputy Attys. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
451 A.2d 442
SCHOOL DISTRICT OF PITTSBURGH, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF EDUCATION.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 21, 1982.
Decided Oct. 29, 1982.
Persifor S. Oliver, Jr., Asst. Sol., Robert J. Stefanko, Sol., Bd. of Public Educ., School Dist. of Pgh. Legal Dept., Pittsburgh, for appellant.
Elisabeth S. Shuster, Mollie A. McCurdy, Deputy Attys. Gen., Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
